title: Spelp
description:
Spelp is an arena-survival game with roguelite elements. With simple twin-stick shooter controls, eliminate thousands of aliens to get stronger. Select from a variety of upgradable weapons and passives to make a unique build and try to survive until the planet is safe. Stardust is a giant exoplanet where other members of the SPELP program has been made prisoners , save them to form a team. Last Epoch
Select members with unique characteristics to perfect your build. A team full of aliens with life-steal and bullet bounces or a team with humans and robots where gigantic black holes do the job for you The Lab is a more confined space, monsters spawn in wave and you will get no help from the SPELP program to survive against the result of alien experimentations.

system_requirements.OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
